Class PromptEngine

java.lang.Object
PromptEngine
public class PromptEngine extends Object
ASCIIADVENTURER Caden Finley Albert Tucker Grijesh Shrestha https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TkJ2dFtD0ho The PromptEngine class generates prompts for a text adventure game using an OpenAI API key.

    buildHelpPrompt(String[] availableCommands)
    The function `buildHelpPrompt` generates a help prompt for a text adventure game with available commands using chatGPT if AI generation is enabled.

    The `buildPrompt` function generates a prompt for a text adventure game, providing information about the player's location, nearby structures, and distances in a descriptive manner.

    The function `returnPrompt` checks if AI generation is enabled, highlights keywords in the prompt, and returns the modified prompt or a message if AI generation is disabled.

  • Method Details

    • buildPrompt

      public static void buildPrompt()
      The `buildPrompt` function generates a prompt for a text adventure game, providing information about the player's location, nearby structures, and distances in a descriptive manner.

    • buildHelpPrompt

      public static void buildHelpPrompt(String[] availableCommands)
      The function `buildHelpPrompt` generates a help prompt for a text adventure game with available commands using chatGPT if AI generation is enabled.
      Parameters:
      availableCommands - It looks like the `buildHelpPrompt` method is designed to generate a help prompt for a text adventure game. The method takes an array of available commands as a parameter. These commands are the actions that the player can use in the game.

    • returnPrompt

      public static String returnPrompt()
      The function `returnPrompt` checks if AI generation is enabled, highlights keywords in the prompt, and returns the modified prompt or a message if AI generation is disabled.
      Returns:
      The method `returnPrompt()` returns the generated prompt with highlighted keywords if AI generation is enabled. If AI generation is disabled, it returns the message "AI generation is disabled. Please enable it in settings."

    • testAPIKey

      public static boolean testAPIKey(String apiKey)
      The function `testAPIKey` sends a test message to an API endpoint using the provided API key and checks if a valid response is received.
      Parameters:
      apiKey - The `testAPIKey` method you provided is used to test the validity of an API key by making a request to the OpenAI API endpoint. The `apiKey` parameter is the API key that is passed to the method for testing.
      Returns:
      The `testAPIKey` method returns a boolean value. If the API key is valid and the response from the API contains expected content, it returns `true`. If there is an IOException (e.g., internet connection issue) or the response does not contain the expected content, it returns `false`.

    • setPromptLength

      public static void setPromptLength(String length)
      The function `setPromptLength` sets the length of a prompt based on the input string "short", "medium", or "long".
      Parameters:
      length - The `length` parameter in the `setPromptLength` method is a String that specifies the desired length of the prompt. It can have three possible values: "short", "medium", or "long". The method sets the `promptLength` variable based on the value of the `length`
